text: "Douyin" privacy policy

label: Policy Change

text: Effective date: July 07, 2022

"Douyin" refers to Beijing Micro Broadcasting Vision Technology Co., Ltd. and its related parties (hereinafter referred to as "we").The client application, official website, and software development tool package (SDK) and application programming interfaces used by third-party websites and applications (SDK) and application programming interfaces (SDK) and application programming interfaces (SD) and application programming interfacesAPI).

As the operator of Douyin, we know the importance of personal information to you. We will protect your personal information and privacy security in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations.
We formulate this privacy policy and special reminders: I hope you can read and understand the privacy policy carefully before using Douyin and related services to make appropriate choices.
overview
We will introduce you how we handle personal information in different scenarios through this privacy policy.
When you open or use Douyin, we will handle relevant information to achieve the functions, services you choose to use, or to comply with laws and regulations.

Except for the basic functions of Douyin, the information required by the service and the required information required by laws and regulations, you can refuse us to deal with other information, but this may cause us to not provide corresponding functions and services.
We will explain the relevant situation in the privacy policy. The important terms of your personal information rights and interests have been prompted in a bold form. Please pay special attention.

The actual functions between Douyin and Douyin's associated versions may be slightly different, but if there is no independent privacy policy, we will follow this privacy policy collection and handle your personal information.
If the associated version of Douyin has an independent privacy policy, the affiliated version of the privacy policy is applicable at the same time.
If the privacy policy and the privacy policy of this associated version are inconsistent, the affiliated version of the privacy policy is applicable.

In addition to this privacy policy, in specific scenarios, we will also explain the corresponding information collection purposes, scope and usage methods through instant notifications (including pop -up windows, page prompts, etc.), functional update instructions, etc. These instant notifications will be notified in real time.And functional renewal instructions, such as part of the composition privacy policy, have the same effect as this privacy policy.
The following will help you understand how we collect, use, store, transmit, open and protect personal information;
Help you understand the way query, correct, supplement, delete, copy, and transfer personal information.
Among them, the important content of your personal information rights has been prompted in a thick form, please pay special attention.
